name: Jeep Ramp Race
description:
Race your yellow jeep Sahara against AI driven competitors. 

The race is off world at 1/10th of earth's gravity.  Negotiate ramps and hilly terrain.   Turn too quickly at too high a speed and you  will spin out.

CONTROLS

The mouse controls steering.

The right mouse button is the accelerator.

The key is cruise at 60kmph.

The key is brake.

If you fall too far behind, the key will restart the race.

The key skips to the next race track.

The key toggles access to the menu including resolution.

The key toggles display buffering in case the display is tearing.
